name: specture
description: specture is a portfolio project that showcases my skills and projects. It is built using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and various libraries such as Bootstrap, Swiper, and Tailwind CSS.

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run sass" "npm run global" "npm start"
scripts.build: sass asset/sass/main.scss asset/css/style.css && sass asset/sass/global.scss asset/css/global.css

author: Mudassir Aftab
